nodes.text: The father of the Dubravan female Nevana owed a large debt to the bounty hunter Sarma in 0 ABY. His daughter tried to clear his debt by selling Sarma the name and location of Luke Skywalker, the pilot who had destroyed the Death Star and was wanted by the Galactic Empire. Rather than accede to Nevana's demands, however, Sarma turned her in to the Imperial stormtroopers stationed on the planet Dubrava.
